name: Tanks! (Daniel Whitfeld)
description:
Tanks! is a top down, action, shooter where you play as a tank in a desert and your objective is to destroy the enemy tanks as fast as possible without dying yourself.

The game was created by me, over the course of a few months, through tutorials as I learned to use the unity engine and code in C++. This final product is what I submitted for the executable part of the first assessment.

CONTROLS:

Movement - W A S D

Aim - Mouse Movement

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Close Application - Escape
